meaningMnemonic: When you <radical>say</radical> "<radical>Nurse</radical>!" you're probably asking to <kanji>defer</kanji> to them in some way, shape, or form.
readingMnemonic: The reason you’re trying to <kanji>defer</kanji> to a nurse is because you’re trying to save the local farmhand, <reading>Joe</reading> (じょう). He’s seriously injured, and you don’t know how to help him, so you’ll have to defer to the knowledge of a nurse.
